title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)
descriptions:
**Product Name:** Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1)

**Description:**

Discover a whole new world of learning with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu! This AR-powered STEM toy is designed for children aged 4-10 years old and offers a unique blend of math, spelling, vocabulary, and puzzle-solving with magnetic blocks. The pack includes three kits: Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link, each focusing on developing specific skills in an engaging and interactive way.

**Educational Value:**

The Plugo STEM Pack is an excellent tool for developing a wide range of skills, including counting, arithmetic, linguistic comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills. With 15 interactive games and over 750 levels, this toy provides progressive education from pre-K to Grade 4, ensuring your child's continuous learning and growth.

**Components:**

The pack includes a foldable mat with a device slot and embedded magnets, serving as the gamepad for your child's learning adventures. The developers have ensured compatibility with a wide range of devices, including iOS and Android smartphones, and specific iPad and Amazon Fire models. You can check the full compatibility list on the PlayShifu website.

**App Availability:**

The Plugo app is available for free on both App Store and Play Store, with no additional in-app purchases required. The app offers a seamless, ad-free learning experience, allowing your child to focus on their learning journey.

**STEM Focus:**

The Plugo STEM Pack is designed to foster a love for STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math) subjects in your child. With a focus on math, engineering, and linguistic abilities, this toy encourages critical thinking and problem-solving in a fun and engaging way.

**Gift Suitability:**

This product is suitable for both boys and girls, making it an excellent gift for any child within the 4-10 age range.

**Device Compatibility:**

- iOS: Compatible with iPhone 6 & above, iPad 5th Gen & above. Not compatible with iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9”.
- Android: Requires OS version 8 & above, 2GB RAM & above, front camera positioned at top centre. Devices with a screen size of 10 inches & above are not supported.
- Amazon Fire: Compatible with 7 - 2022, 8 - 2018 & 2020, 8+ - 2020 models.

**Box Contents:**

- 3 Plugo kits (Count, Link, and Letters)
- 1 Plugo Gamepad

**Please Note:** This product does not include a device. You will need to use your own compatible device to play the games.

Unlock your child's potential with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu!
